forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
The air in Downtown San Francisco carries a crisp clarity, inviting yet with an unmistakable chill. This afternoon's sun graces the city with a gentle warmth, peeking through a thin veil of tranquility, but do not let that fool you; the reality of temperatures slipping down to around fifty-one introduces a bit of that signature San Francisco coolness. The northwest wind whispers softly at five to eight miles per hour, just enough to remind you that winter is making itself known, though not unkindly. Tonight, the sky will transition to a partly cloudy canvas, draping soft shadows over the city as the temperature dips to around forty-eight.

As you navigate these beautifully mild conditions, consider layering up. A light jacket over a cozy sweater will keep you comfortable as you stroll along the Embarcadero or explore the vibrant streets of the Mission. In the twilight, the flickering city lights will emerge, calling for a leisurely evening walk or perhaps stopping in at a local café to savor a warm drink. The fog may linger on the edges of the bay, but it appears to respect the fortitude of the day, retreating just enough for the evening to unfold with a sense of quiet wonder. Enjoying this charm of San Francisco on a crisp December day feels like a small gift, easily unraveled if you take the time to breathe it in.
